channel.title: Lang null pointer exception
channel.description:
Hi, trying to make 667 client work, get this:[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException at Loader.openFrame(Loader.java:198) at Loader.doFrame(Loader.java:102) at Loader.main(Loader.java:70) [/code]
:L looked through loader at the lines it says and cannot find any null and have no idea why it would throw the error :/ help me please.
Loader.java: [url=http://pastebin.com/WZ4LabjE]http://pastebin.com/WZ4LabjE[/url]

item.title: Lang null pointer exception
